resources.string: 1.Battery Connected/Disconnected: Triggers a notification when the device establishes or loses a charging connection..
2.Connectivity State Listener: Listens for events notifying of changes in the network connection type..
3.Airplane Mode Status: Informs you about whether airplane mode, which disables connections, is activated or deactivated.
5.Wireless Network Monitor: Provides real-time updates on your Wi-Fi connectivity (connected, disconnected, or toggled)..
6.Data Connection: Informs you about your mobile data usage status (on/off)..
7.Automatic Screen Lock: Monitors whether the screen is on and might also refer to the automatic lock functionality (optional)..
4.Bluetooth Adapter State: Tracks the power state (on/off) and connection status (connected/disconnected) of the Bluetooth adapter..
